channel.title: Bruno Mars on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Bruno Mars on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: 2025 VMA Nominations Revealed: Lady Gaga Leads With 12, Followed by Bruno Mars and Kendrick Lamar
item.description: The music awards show is set to take place on Sunday, Sept. 7, airing on CBS for the first time alongside the ceremony’s longtime home of MTV.
